idea-plugin.name: Red Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Red Theme

A sleek, high-contrast dark theme accented with vibrant reds and cyan highlights.

  • Dark UI tuned for long coding sessions
  • Readable contrast and subtle backgrounds
  • Optional editor color scheme applied automatically

Tip: Enable “Use color scheme from theme” in Editor settings to auto-apply the scheme.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Initial release
  • Includes Red theme and bundled editor color scheme
